detectCmp.exists: body > div#consent > user-consent:nth-child(1):not([id]) > consent-dialog:not([id]) > consent-content:not([id]) > consent-message:nth-child(1):not([id]) > button:nth-child(1):not([id])

optOut.waitForThenClick: body > div#consent > user-consent:nth-child(1):not([id]) > consent-dialog:not([id]) > consent-content:not([id]) > consent-message:nth-child(1):not([id]) > button:nth-child(1):not([id])

test.waitForVisible: body > div#consent > user-consent:nth-child(1):not([id]) > consent-dialog:not([id]) > consent-content:not([id]) > consent-message:nth-child(1):not([id]) > button:nth-child(1):not([id])
